reviews.title: good company but has problem
reviews.pros: very chill working environment and co-works are nice
reviews.cons: there is little career progress here

reviews.title: Changing but still positive
reviews.pros: Very good benefits, pay and relative job security
reviews.cons: Copying service design from companies that are not related to airbnb will result in some headwinds - we are not Apple

reviews.title: Toxic and highly political
reviews.pros: Some people are nice, high calibre and actually care about the business. Benefits are good, better than most companies.
reviews.cons: Bad middle management and leadership. Highly political environment, with all decisions made in headquarters. Top down and uninspirational colleagues - some have been with the company for 5+ years and have become toxic / lost work ethic
reviews.advice: Think about how to actually implement the highly raved culture, rather than words on a board. Culture is not upheld, no one cares about belonging and have even basic courtesy. Remove bad hires who are eating the culture

reviews.title: Would come back
reviews.pros:
Healthy cost strategies and balance, keeping headcount flat and focusing on scalability. 
Forward looking, adapting to AI technologies.
reviews.cons: Remote work gives flexibility but also loses that human touch

reviews.title: Greatest Company Ever
reviews.pros: Great Culture, People, Purpose Good internal mobility Great benefits
reviews.cons: Some managers have been there for too long. Need to clean house or repurpose to get new thinking and ideas in place.

reviews.title: Great Culture
reviews.pros: No work pressure, office culture is really good, no internal politics observed.
reviews.cons: Average pay, there are other companies in the market which pay double of what's paid here for similar profile.

reviews.title: Amazing team, pay, and interesting problems
reviews.pros: Working with cutting edge tech, driven and reliable teammates, top pay, amazing wfh benefits
reviews.cons: As good as youâ€™re going to get working in tech

reviews.title: Self imposed chaos
reviews.pros: - Good people for the most part, slowly losing culture though - Good compensation - Work anywhere flexibility for those who can take advantage of it
reviews.cons: - Top heavy decision making - Direction can change on a whim - Long hours if working on company launches - Unnecessarily complicated

reviews.title: Overall amazing culture
reviews.pros: great culture, fantastic initiatives and ceo
reviews.cons: slow progression, grew slightly too quickly without structure
